author: vlimant
body:
as commented in https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/pull/1866#issuecomment-1298570409 the current script is not parsing the edm flat table automatically, and is not compatible with pure-root nano output.
this PR tries to address both issues.
I might include the matrix_RE change for the new nano workflows
title: automatic finding of edm and pure root nano branches
